last_episode_to_air.name: All Night Senior Party
last_episode_to_air.overview: The group spends their last days of high school together before going separate ways. Dionne is particularly upset that Murray is going away to Africa and decides to get back with him.

name: Clueless
overview: CLUELESS is a television series spun off from the 1995 teen film of the same name. The series originally premiered on ABC on September 20, 1996 as a part of the TGIF lineup during its first season. The show then spent its last two seasons on UPN ending on May 25, 1999.

episodes.name: As If a Girl's Reach Should Exceed Her Grasp
episodes.overview: Cher wreaks havoc when she takes over the school paper's advice column as "Miss Buzzline," and is panned by students when her honest yet naive approach creates trouble for her friends and classmates.

episodes.name: To Party or Not to Party
episodes.overview: Cher enrolls into drama class and meets a handsome guy named Donal. Despite her father giving her her a strict curfew, she sets a date with Donal at a late-night Jazz and poetry club.

episodes.name: City Beautification
episodes.overview: Cher and the gang help clean up a community park.

episodes.name: Do We with Bad Haircuts Not Feel?
episodes.overview: A celebrity hairstylist gives Cher a new look.

episodes.name: We Shall Overpack
episodes.overview: Cher leads a revolution against the school's backpack ban, demanding the principal give packs a chance.

episodes.name: Making up is Hard to Do
episodes.overview: Cher tries to reunite Murray and Dionne after the couple splits on Halloween.

episodes.name: Don't Stand So Close To Me
episodes.overview: Cher is infatuated with her substitute teacher and decides that she needs to become more mature. Put on a budget by her father, she tries to buy the perfect outfit to attract his attention.

episodes.name: Kiss Me Kip
episodes.overview: Cher gets hold of a movie star's planner to find and locate his every move.

episodes.name: I Got You Babe
episodes.overview: Cher falls deeply in love with a college student named Sonny. They are a match made in heaven until Sonny finds out how old Cher is.

episodes.name: Driving Me Crazy
episodes.overview: Driver's Ed starts and Cher decides to try for her driver's license.

episodes.name: Romeo & Cher
episodes.overview: Cher falls in love with Skylar, the son of her father's arch rival. In order to be allowed to see him,  she makes every effort to reconcile the quarreling fathers.

episodes.name: Cher, Inc.
episodes.overview: Cher and Dionne rediscover the muff as a fashion accessory. When everybody at school wants one, she decides to start her own business produce her muff bag in series.

episodes.name: Fixing Up Daddy
episodes.overview: Cher believes that she has found the perfect woman for her father in Sheila Kendall, a lawyer and bestselling author. So she sets tries everything for the two fall in love.

episodes.name: The Party's Over
episodes.overview: The school's newest principal forces the students to wear uniforms.

episodes.name: I'm in with the Out Crowd
episodes.overview: While being partnered with outcast Felice, Cher discovers that she genuinely likes her and has to decide between her new friendship and her social standing at school.

episodes.name: All Teed Off
episodes.overview: New golfer Murray neglects Dionne.

episodes.name: Mr. Wright
episodes.overview: Cher tries to find a flaw in her seemingly perfect new boyfriend.

episodes.name: Secrets & Lies
episodes.overview: Cher unintentionally causes trouble between Dionne and Murray on Valentine's Day when Murray learns that Dionne once dated Sean.

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: Cher is undecided about her future plans after high school as the gang prepares their ensembles for the first day of school.

episodes.name: Salsa, Chlorine & Tears
episodes.overview: Cher falls for a salsa singer named Ricardo who also works as a part-time pool cleaner.

episodes.name: Suddenly Stupid
episodes.overview: Cher and Dionne decide to help Felice when they finds out that Felice pretends she is dumb to attract guys.

episodes.name: Sharing Cher
episodes.overview: Amber and Dionne compete for Cher's attention.

episodes.name: Chick Fight Tonight
episodes.overview: Cher keeps running afoul of Oddrey, the meanest girl in school. She soon becomes her opponent in self-defense class.

episodes.name: Trick or Treat
episodes.overview: Cher, Dionne, Amber, Sean and Murray are invited by Amber to attend an exclusive Hollywood Halloween party, which turns out to be a stage crew party instead.

episodes.name: Homecoming Queen
episodes.overview: Cher runs for homecoming queen in order to win and renounce the crown.

episodes.name: Shop 'Til You Drop
episodes.overview: Cher and Dionne enroll in shop class to meet boys.

episodes.name: The Intruder
episodes.overview: Cher tries to end the relationship when Mel dates her art teacher.

episodes.name: Intruder Spawn
episodes.overview: While Cher's father and his girlfriend Rebecca are going away for the weekend, she decides to have a big party in their absence. But Rebecca's son Cody threatens to thwart her plans.

episodes.name: Valley of the Malls
episodes.overview: Cher takes a part-time job at an unfashionable mall.

episodes.name: A Very P.C. Holiday
episodes.overview: Hoping to give her father an innovative Hanukkah present, Cher auditions to sing in the school pageant.

episodes.name: Labor of Love
episodes.overview: The students observe professionals off campus for the annual career day.

episodes.name: Dance Fever
episodes.overview: Everyone interrupts Cher's chance to dance with a potential boyfriend at the dance.

episodes.name: In Boyfriend We Trust
episodes.overview: Cher spots her new boyfriend with his ex.

episodes.name: The Joint
episodes.overview: Cher and Dionne's old friend Emily makes a surprise visit from New York. Emily is now a morbid goth and gets them in trouble for smoking a joint. Meanwhile, Sean and Murray go camping with Mel and Emily's father.

episodes.name: Life is a Beach
episodes.overview: Cher and friends act out their fantasies at the beach.

episodes.name: P.G. Seventeen
episodes.overview: The gang learns a friend must postpone college due to an unplanned pregnancy.

episodes.name: Let's Stay Together
episodes.overview: Dionne and Murray's breakup threatens to split their circle of friends right before Cher's birthday party.

episodes.name: Friends
episodes.overview: Newly separated Murray and Dionne pretend to have dates to spark jealousy. While Amber, Cher and Sean all visit an retirement home to gain extra credit at school, they meet people with personalities similar to their own.

episodes.name: Sean's Video
episodes.overview: Cher directs Sean and the gang in a music video.

episodes.name: Cashless
episodes.overview: Cher has a garage sale when the accountant leaves them penniless.

episodes.name: Bakersfield Blues
episodes.overview: Cher and Mel adjust to life in Bakersfield. Dionne, Sean and Murray plan to visit Cher after they learn that Amber has moved into Cher's home with her family.

episodes.name: Back from Bakersfield
episodes.overview: Cher's friends decide to rescue her and bring her back to Beverly Hills by finding Mel a huge case that he can use his lawyer skills on to make the money and move back home.

episodes.name: Model Smoker
episodes.overview: Cher falls for a gorgeous model and then learns he's a smoker.

episodes.name: Scream Murray, Scream! (1)
episodes.overview: Bone-chilling phone calls scare Cher and Dionne while a killer stalks the gang.

episodes.name: Scream Again Murray, Scream Again! (2)
episodes.overview: The gang must find the stalker before their lives turn into real-life horror.

episodes.name: Cher and Cher Alike
episodes.overview: Cher lands the lead in the school's production of Grease.

episodes.name: Father's Keeper
episodes.overview: Dionne finds a way for Cher to attend college and not worry about her father.

episodes.name: Never P.E.T.A. Squirrel
episodes.overview: A squirrel terrorizes the Horowitz household on Thanksgiving.

episodes.name: Our Lady of Rodeo Drive
episodes.overview: An auto-body man swears that a holy apparition resides in a BMW dent.

episodes.name: Nice Girls Finish Last
episodes.overview: The gang helps Dionne soften her image.

episodes.name: Mercy Date
episodes.overview: Cher attends a sci-fi convention with Marshall, the school nerd.

episodes.name: Child Bride
episodes.overview: Cher and Dionne try to stop Amber from marrying an elderly millionaire.

episodes.name: Popularity
episodes.overview: Cher tutors the school's basketball star, who learns he really dislikes the sport.

episodes.name: My Best Friend's Boyfriend
episodes.overview: Dionne feels betrayed when her boyfriend takes a liking to Cher.

episodes.name: None for the Road
episodes.overview: Cher's birthday party is an incredible bash until Sean, Murray and Adam end up in the hospital; leaving tragic news in the end.

episodes.name: Cher's Weekend at Bernie's
episodes.overview: Cher looks for clues to her teacher's harsh behavior after he dies.

episodes.name: Parent Trap
episodes.overview: On the verge of divorce, Amber's parents display marital woes in public.

episodes.name: Big Sissies
episodes.overview: Amber mentors a girl from another part of town and shows her life in Beverly Hills.

episodes.name: A Test of Character
episodes.overview: Dionne joins a band and enters the school talent contest, but fails the mandatory drug test.

episodes.name: Prom Misses, Prom Misses
episodes.overview: Cher and Dionne audition potential prom dates from sign-up sheets, while Amber is escorted by a Leonardo DiCaprio lookalike. Meanwhile, Murray becomes attracted to Sean's prom date, Niecy Jackson.

episodes.name: Graduation
episodes.overview: Sean is in trouble because he is living in a neighborhood outside of the school district. Murray reveals that he is going Africa to work with his father instead of going to college.

episodes.name: All Night Senior Party
episodes.overview: The group spends their last days of high school together before going separate ways. Dionne is particularly upset that Murray is going away to Africa and decides to get back with him.
